div.p: Media Access Group at WGBH access.wgbh.org

OH, MY GOD HOLD ON A BULLETIN THIS JUST IN FROM THE NEWS DESK.
WHILE WE WERE TAPING THE PROGRAM THAT WE TAPED INCLUDING THE BIT ABOUT FACEBOOK NOT WANTING TO
DIVULGE THEIR FINANCIAL INFORMATION BEING KIND OF IRONIC GIVEN THEIR SHARING THING THEY
ANNOUNCED IN APRIL 2012 THEY'LL DIVULGE EVEN IF THEY DON'T GO PUBLIC THEIR FINANCIAL INFORMATION.
SO I GUESS I HAVE TO FIGURE OUT A WAY TO UPDATE THAT INFORMATION USING SOME KIND OF TECHNOLOGY.
HERE IT IS YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> PURSUANT TO SENATE RESOLUTION -- WHAT'S THE NUMBER NUMBER -- 1 --
